markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Palm Crossbow](/Equipment.aspx?ID=766)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 25</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Spare bolts for a palm crossbow cost 2 sp for 10 bolts and are the same rarity as the crossbow itself (rare)._

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This thick, elegant bracelet conceals a specialized firing mechanism that can hold a single blowgun dart. You can fire the dart normally from the bracelet. Recognizing the bracelet's nature requires a successful DC 25 Perception check.

<document level="2" id="action-606" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Palm Crossbow
